# Mood Journal - Project Instructions Index

## Personal Notes
- Always try to give notes/comments in Indonesian at key parts of the code, especially in complex logic areas.

## Documentation Index

This project's documentation has been split into the following files for better organization:

1.  **[Project Overview](project-overview.md)**
    - High-level description for new developers.
    - Key features and technology stack summary.

2.  **[Run Guide](run-guide.md)**
    - Step-by-step instructions to set up and run the project.
    - Environment variable configuration.
    - Troubleshooting tips.

3.  **[Detailed Project Description](project-details.md)**
    - In-depth architecture overview.
    - Authentication flow details.
    - Service architecture (Backend, Frontend, WebSocket).
    - Coding patterns and conventions.
